content:
Yes, there are several researchers in Pune, India who study mangroves and their ecological, economic, and cultural importance. Here are a few notable ones:

1. Dr. R. K. Singh, National Centre for Coastal Research, Pune
2. Dr. B. D. Malgaonkar, National Centre for Sustainable Coastal Management, Pune
3. Dr. S. K. Barik, Indian Institute of Tropical Meteorology, Pune
4. Dr. B. B. Jagtap, Indian Institute of Science Education and Research, Pune
5. Dr. M. R. Kulkarni, University of Pune, Pune

These are just a few examples of researchers in Pune who study mangroves. There may be others who are conducting important research in this field, both in academia and government organizations.
